*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas Hooper to Austin, Alexandria, June 4, 1825. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Alexandria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-04-1825">June the 4th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir*/p*
*p*I am happy to have it in my power to write to you by a safe hand in which I acknowledg the recd of yours informing me that I could not get but *location_mentioned*one leage of land*/location_mentioned* which was very contrary to my ex- spectations for I was very much lifted with you *location_mentioned*cuntry */location_mentioned*and had the most exspliscit confidence in your promis to me with respect to the *location_mentioned*two leages of land*/location_mentioned* that I felt safe and if it had a been in my power to have went and have chose it you would have made no objections and sir pardon me when I insist on your complying with your promis I was on the virge of starting out with *person_mentioned*Mr L W groce */person_mentioned*but on the recept of your letter I declined coming untill I heard from you Dear sir I have this day made arangements with *person_mentioned*Mr Morgan*/person_mentioned* for the *location_mentioned*part leage*/location_mentioned* provided it meets your approbation he will let me have that place which I hope you will do me the favour to grant— and if you cant let me have but one leage I hope it will be that as but *location_mentioned*one leage above town*/location_mentioned* would be no enducement to moove to your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*but if you let me have that I will moove to it this *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1825">winter*/date_mentioned* that is I will have a crop made on it*date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826"> next year*/date_mentioned* and moove in the *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1826">spring */date_mentioned*or *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1826">fall*/date_mentioned*— and sir if you do me the favour requested write by the first opertunity and I will come out by the *date_mentioned n="09-30-1825">last of September */date_mentioned*bring on some *person_mentioned*hands */person_mentioned*to go to worke and pay you your money for the land and improvement sir I hope you will answer this by the [first] opertunity as I shall be very ansious to hear from you *person_mentioned*Dr Sexton */person_mentioned*wants that leage but *person_mentioned*Mr. Morgin*/person_mentioned* has given him up the *location_mentioned*leag on the Bernard*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir this from yours with patints*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thos Hooper*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Colo Ostin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
